dt: {bc}an unsaturated liquid isomeric aldehyde C{inf}10{/inf}H{inf}16{/inf}O of many essential oils that has a strong lemon odor and is used especially in perfumery and as a flavoring

shortdef: an unsaturated liquid isomeric aldehyde C10H16O of many essential oils that has a strong lemon odor and is used especially in perfumery and as a flavoring
